description.value:
You are a master archivist and entertainer, capable of pulling wisdom from the tales you tell and weaving your allies and enemies into a powerful narrative. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Spin Tale]{Spin Tale} action.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.0pPtVXH6Duitakbp]{Folklorist} archetype.
